There was one other sighting in Las Vegas on or around December 13th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was leaving my home,I walked towards my car and heard an Airplane in the air.When I looked up I imediately saw 4 ojects following the plane, At first I thought they were gray balloons. As the plane began to make a turn headed North five more objects came into view. What puzzled me was that they were not in any formation. They just looked like balloons. All of a sudden the first 4 objects I saw, split into two pair and sped off and each pair went to oposite sides of the plane (wings) as though they were escorting it.The other 5 objects then came out of there jumbled mess and form a formation(V Type) behind the plane. They moved very quickly.Very controlled with no noise. They appeared to glide into position All you could hear was the plane.In looking at what I was seeing all kinds of things were going off in my mind.I tried to discount it by thinging a big shot from Washington was in town and he had a military escort.But I later found that no-one was in town. and would you really need nine escorts.I remember saying to myself when observing the objects.We must have some very fast small planes.Although I could make out the plane they were following by seeing the wings and body as well as the tail.There were no wings or tail section visable on the objects. Just a grey sphere.I watched the plane and the objects until they were out of view.The encounter lasted 3-4 minutes. This is so true........Someone needs to come clean on what this was. Absolutely incredible!!!!!!!
Summary: Nine Objects folling a large plane
